title: About Me
intro: Hello! I'm Primavera, your guide to the heart of Vienna.
bio1: With a background in event management and pedagogy, I've always been passionate about creating meaningful experiences and bringing people together. There's nothing I love more than showing visitors the many different faces of my beautiful hometown.
bio2: Through these tours, I aim to share not just the famous landmarks, but also the hidden gems and local stories that make Vienna truly special.
